metadata.title: CVE-2017-9438 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
libyara/re.c in the regexp module in YARA 3.5.0 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (stack consumption) via a crafted rule (involvinghex strings) that is mishandled in the _yr_re_emit function, a differentvulnerability than CVE-2017-9304.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9438` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libyara3 - 3.7.1-1ubuntu2
yara - 3.7.1-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: yara package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.7.1-1ubuntu2').
